channel.title: Web Development on Vivian Leung
channel.description: Recent content in Web Development on Vivian Leung

item.title: Logseq plugins
item.description: I develop plugins to enhance the overall user experience for Logseq, an open-source personal knowledge management system and note-taking application.

item.title: FlowPomoTimer
item.description: I created a timer called FlowPomoTimer so that I can 1) keep track of how long I’ve been working on a task and 2) get notified at certain intervals so that I don’t lose track of time.
